text: Manhunt is a video game. It is a 2003 stealth video game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. == References == *Manhunt on archive.org Category:2003 video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Psychological horror games Category:Rockstar Games games Category:Single-player video games Category:Stealth video games Category:Organized crime video games Category:Video games set in psychiatric hospitals Category:Video games about death games Category:Video games set in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: Manhunt (video game)
